thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian And Her Kids Have Some Super Halloween Costumes
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian And Her Kids Have Some Super Halloween Costumes

author: Lauren Zupkus
title: Kourtney Kardashian And Her Kids Have Some Super Halloween Costumes
text:
Kourtney Kardashian And Her Kids Have Some Super Halloween Costumes Plus North West as a unicorn. Lauren Zupkus Social Media Editor for Entertainment, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/25/2015 10:36 AM EDT 
It's a bird ... it's a plane ... it's Kourtney Kardashian's adorable little squad of superheroes! 
Apparently getting a head start on Halloween, the 36-year-old mother of three suited up her brood in some costumes that made them look ready to save the world. Mason, 5, Penelope, 3, and Reign, 10 months, were decked out in masks and capes alongside their Wonder Woman mama. Kardashian's niece, North West, did her own thing and went as a unicorn. ‚ö°Ô∏èüéØ‚≠êÔ∏è A photo posted by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Oct 24, 2015 at 8:30pm PDT A photo posted by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Oct 24, 2015 at 6:03pm PDT 
Up, up, and away!
